misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a formidable presence from Hirsala Golf, has been a recurring figure at the Hector Trophée, known for his strategic play and resilient spirit despite battling chronic back issues. His dedication to the sport is evident in his commitment to the competition, as he is still actively participating in Hector events.

With four past appearances, Okko brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Okko has secured one victory in the Hector Trophée, demonstrating his capability to perform under pressure and lead his pair to success.

Beyond his golfing achievements, Okko is also remembered for the infamous 'Okkotoberfest,' a phenomenon named after his memorable, alcohol-induced antics during a past Hector event. This colorful episode has cemented his status as one of the more unforgettable characters in the history of the Trophée. As he prepares for his fifth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation is high to see if Okko can once again find himself on the winner's podium.
